item.name: stripeViewFinderMargin
item.description: The minimum distance between the edge of the screen and the view finder window, in percentage of the screen

item.name: stripeViewFinderVerticalBias
item.description: The vertical position of the view finder. Lower numbers shift the view finder towards the top of the screen

item.name: stripeViewFinderHorizontalBias
item.description: The horizontal position of the view finder. Lower numbers shift the view finder towards the left of the screen

dimen.name: stripeCardDetailsMargin
dimen.description: The minimum vertical and horizontal distance between the card details (number, expiry, name) and the border of the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeInstructionsMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the instructions text above the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeSecurityMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the security notification text below the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeSecurityIconMargin
dimen.description: The distance between the security notification lock icon and the security notification text

item.name: stripeNotFoundOutlineWidth
item.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when no card is present

item.name: stripeFoundOutlineWidth
item.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when a card has been found and the scan has started

item.name: stripeCorrectOutlineWidth
item.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when the scan completes

item.name: stripeWrongOutlineWidth
item.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when a card has been found but does not match the required card

dimen.name: stripePanTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the card number text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

item.name: stripePanStrokeSize
item.description: The size of the outline of the card number text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeNameTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the cardholder name text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

item.name: stripeNameStrokeSize
item.description: The size of the outline of the cardholder name text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeExpiryTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the expiry text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

item.name: stripeExpiryStrokeSize
item.description: The size of the outline of the expiry text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeInstructionsTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the instructions text above the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeSecurityTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the security text below the view finder window

dimen.name: stripeLogoMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the logo

item.name: stripeIconStrokeWidth
item.description: The width of the lines of the close and torch buttons

dimen.name: stripeDebugWindowWidth
dimen.description: The width of the debug window

dimen.name: stripeButtonMargin
dimen.description: The amount of margin to place around the buttons
